metadata.description: Name of the environment to generate a short unique hash for all resources.

roleDefinitionName.defaultValue: Azure Cosmos DB for NoSQL Data Plane Owner

resources.name: [format('{0}/{1}', variables('cosmos_name'), guid(resourceId('Microsoft.DocumentDB/databaseAccounts/sqlRoleDefinitions', variables('cosmos_name'), guid(resourceId('Microsoft.DocumentDB/databaseAccounts', variables('cosmos_name')), parameters('roleDefinitionName'))), variables('webapp_name'), resourceId('Microsoft.DocumentDB/databaseAccounts', variables('cosmos_name'))))]
